name: @nouns/subgraph
description: A subgraph that indexes nouns events
author: Nounders

scripts.deploy:hardhat: pnpm clean && pnpm prepare:hardhat && pnpm codegen && pnpm create:localnode nounsdao/nouns-subgraph && pnpm deploy:localnode nounsdao/nouns-subgraph
scripts.deploy:rinkeby: pnpm clean && pnpm prepare:rinkeby && pnpm codegen && pnpm deploy nounsdao/nouns-subgraph-rinkeby
scripts.deploy:goerli: pnpm clean && pnpm prepare:goerli && pnpm codegen && pnpm graph build && goldsky subgraph deploy nouns-v3-goerli/0.1.6
scripts.deploy:sepolia: pnpm clean && pnpm prepare:sepolia && pnpm codegen && pnpm graph build && goldsky subgraph deploy nouns-sepolia-client-incentives/0.1.1
scripts.deploy:mainnet: pnpm clean && pnpm prepare:mainnet && pnpm codegen && pnpm graph build && goldsky subgraph deploy nouns/0.2.5
scripts.deploy-studio:mainnet: pnpm clean && pnpm prepare:mainnet && pnpm codegen && pnpm graph build && graph deploy --studio nouns
scripts.deploy-studio:sepolia: pnpm clean && pnpm prepare:sepolia && pnpm codegen && pnpm graph build && graph deploy --studio nouns-sepolia
